translation.Message_0_Page_0: I'm <color=epic>Maria</color>, and I'm the medic here. If you're hurt, you can come to me. But, to deter people from faking injury to get medicine off of me, or wasting it, you'll have to do some favors for my medicine.
translation.Message_0_Page_1: If you complete quests, or give her 20 Dinars, she will give you meds if you talk to her while hurt (below 50% HP or Virus). Make sure you complete quests or bring money, as she won't give handouts!
